title: How to Uninstall Using Revo Uninstaller

steps.title: First of all download Revo Uninstaller from any source and install it in your system.
steps.content: First of all download Revo Uninstaller from any source and install it in your system.

steps.title: Run Revo uninstaller and you will be prompted to a window where all the installed programmes and other Revo utilities are displayed
steps.content: Run Revo uninstaller and you will be prompted to a window where all the installed programmes and other Revo utilities are displayed

steps.title: Choose the desired programme to uninstall by double clicking on the icon.
steps.content: Choose the desired programme to uninstall by double clicking on the icon. Then you will be prompted to Revo uninstaller window were you will it will give you options namely "Safe","Moderate" and "Advanced".

steps.title: Choose the desired option ("Moderate" is recommended in most cases).
steps.content: Choose the desired option ("Moderate" is recommended in most cases). Next you will be advanced to the normal uninstaller of the program while Revo is still behind.

steps.title: Now do the normal uninstallation and on completion you will be redirected back to Revo and click "Scan" to continue.
steps.content: Now do the normal uninstallation and on completion you will be redirected back to Revo and click "Scan" to continue.

steps.title: Normally after the scan, Revo Uninstaller will show a message that there are no leftover files found.
steps.content: Normally after the scan, Revo Uninstaller will show a message that there are no leftover files found. If there leftover files found, they will be shown in bold letters and just click on "Delete".

steps.title: Sometimes after deleting leftover registry files you will be prompted to delete leftover files and folders, again the same - you must check and delete items that apply.
steps.content: Sometimes after deleting leftover registry files you will be prompted to delete leftover files and folders, again the same - you must check and delete items that apply.

steps.title: Now you have finished your task.
steps.content: Now you have finished your task. Click Finish to continue or click back and have more deeper method to uninstall.
